item.title: My new Hugo theme
item.description: As a Hugo user, I want to write my own theme, so that I can learn how Hugo works.

item.title: Platelet Donation Tips
item.description: What do you bring to a platelet donation appointment? What happens there? Read on to find out.

item.title: About
item.description:
My name is Travis Reid Hopkins. You can call me Reid (he/him)!

I graduated from Central Connecticut State University in 2023 and have been working in the industry as a DevOps engineer since. I’m interested in gimmicky computer science tricks, system administration, and cybersecurity. In my free time I also play Bridge.
